contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox surname 2 | name = Quealy | pronunciation = | gender = Unisex | language = [[English language|English]] | languageorigin = [[Irish language|Irish]] | origin = [[Ó Cadhla]] | meaning = "descendant of ''Cadhla''" }} '''Quealy''' is a [[surname]] in the [[English language]]. It is an [[Anglicised]] form of the [[Irish language|Irish]] ''[[Ó Cadhla]]''.<ref name="Woulfe-o-cadhla">{{citation |title=Ó Cadhla |url=http://www.libraryireland.com/names/oc/o-cadhla.php |publisher=Library Ireland (www.libraryireland.com) |accessdate=15 December 2010 }} which is a transcription of: {{citation |last1=Woulfe |first1=Patrick |title=Irish Names and Surnames |year=1923 }}</ref> ==People with the surname== *[[Michael Quealy]], former Fine Gael politician in Ireland *[[Gerit Quealy]], American writer, editor, Shakespearean scholar, and actor ==References== {{reflist}} {{surname}} [[Category:English-language surnames]]
